description: Keep the early morning chill at bay with the Men's Leconte Fleece 1/2-Zip Pullover. With technical grid fleece that moves excess heat and moisture away from your body to help manage your core temp, this fleece jacket is our go-to fall fit. Add it to your layering kit or rock it solo on cool days.
name: Marmot Leconte Fleece 1/2 Zip - Mens
